segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, everything seems so everyday at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is standing there, towel in hand, working on a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks peaceful and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's nice to see such a tidy yard on a sunny day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the faucet's left on, and water's spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is growing, lapping at her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are having a little adventure with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is so determined, like a mini explorer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl reaching up adds to the fun sibling teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how they're sharing this secret moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even with the overflow, the scene feels full of family warmth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's charming, despite the little mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR
